definition: (especially of metamorphic rock) having thin leaflike layers or strata, grow leaves
details:
adjective
- (especially of metamorphic rock) having thin leaflike layers or strata
= synonyms: foliated, foliaceous
- (often used as a combining form) having or resembling a leaf or having a specified kind or number of leaves
= example: (often used as a combining form) having or resembling a leaf or having a specified kind or number of leaves
- ornamented with foliage or foils
= example: ornamented with foliage or foils
= synonyms: foliated
verb
- grow leaves
= example: grow leaves
- number the pages of a book or manuscript
= synonyms: page, paginate
- coat or back with metal foil
= example: coat or back with metal foil
- decorate with leaves
- hammer into thin flat foils
= example: hammer into thin flat foils
